[Docs].description: Updating docs or documenting source code

[Test].description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests

[Style].description: Changing that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

[Build].description: Changing that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)

[Chore].description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files

[CI].description: Changing CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)
